message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 60 and you get 40.  A deal's better now than later with inflation.
I'll take a bit more, considering inflation hits you harder
Bob, my friend, let's be reasonable. I'll take a small hit from my previous offer, you get a bit more than you would have if you accepted in round 1. This deal works for both of us.
Considering the inflation, I think I deserve a bigger share. Let's settle on this before it gets worse for both of us
